tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPC_IN False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_PC_OUT $output_data_PC_OUT output_data_STATISTICS $output_data_STATISTICS name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.11 PC_IN $PC_IN FIELDS $FIELDS METHOD $METHOD NCLUSTER $NCLUSTER NORMALISE $NORMALISE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PC_OUT $OutputSection_PC_OUT.outputType_PC_OUT transmissionMode_PC_OUT $OutputSection_PC_OUT.transmissionMode_PC_OUT outputType_STATISTICS $OutputSection_STATISTICS.outputType_STATISTICS transmissionMode_STATISTICS $OutputSection_STATISTICS.transmissionMode_STATISTICS

param.name: PC_IN
param.label: Point Cloud
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-lasf

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Attributes
param.help: The attribute fields to cluster The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: NORMALISE
param.label: Normalise
param.help: Automatically normalise attributes by standard deviation before clustering.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PC_OUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PC_OUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_STATISTICS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_STATISTICS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Cluster analysis for point clouds.<br/>This tool is a port of the 'Cluster Analysis for Grids' tool from the 'Imagery - Classification' tool library.
